text:
WiseBanyan | Front End Developer | Las Vegas, NV | Onsite

WiseBanyan is the world’s first free financial advisor, whose mission is to ensure everyone can achieve their financial goals. We’re rethinking how the world experiences professional financial services, starting with providing investment management and financial planning for free, with no minimum to start, and completely online. We opened our doors in 2014 and already have tens of thousands of clients and tens of millions of dollars invested on WiseBanyan through our web app and our newly released iOS and Android apps.

More info: https://www.linkedin.com/jobs2/view/132448165

Email our CTO Fernando at fernando@wisebanyan.com
